Parameters: Loader: The loader to run synchronously
getLoaderResultSynchronously(android.con.Description: Runs a Loader synchronously and returns the result of the load. The loader will be started, stopped, and destroyed by this method so it cannot be reused.

ClassDesc: A convenience class for testing @B_android#content#Loader_E@s. This test case provides a simple way to synchronously get the result from a Loader making it easy to assert that the Loader returns the expected result.
